hline(surface, x1, x2, y, color) -> None
if border_radius < 1 it will draw rectangle without rounded corners
trans-unit.target: 如果 border_radius < 1 ，它将绘制没有圆角的矩形

trans-unit.source: if start_angle > stop_angle, tau (tau == 2 * pi) will be added to the stop_angle, if the resulting stop angle value is greater than the start_angle the above start_angle < stop_angle case applies, otherwise nothing will be drawn
trans-unit.target: 如果 start_angle > stop_angle ，则将 tau（tau == 2 * pi）添加到 stop_angle 中，如果最终的停止角值大于 start_angle ,则上述 start_angle < stop_angle 情况适用，否则将不绘制任何内容

trans-unit.source: if start_angle < stop_angle, the arc is drawn in a counterclockwise direction from the start_angle to the stop_angle
trans-unit.target: 如果 start_angle < stop_angle ，则从 start_angle 到 stop_angle 沿逆时针方向绘制弧

trans-unit.source: if start_angle == stop_angle, nothing will be drawn
trans-unit.target: 如果 start_angle == stop_angle ，则不会绘制任何内容

trans-unit.source: if width > 0, (default is 1) used for line thickness

trans-unit.target: 如果 width < 0 ，则不会绘制任何内容
如果 width == 0 ，则不会绘制任何内容

trans-unit.source: if any of border radii has the value < 0 it will use value of the border_radius
trans-unit.target: 如果任何边界半径的值 < 0 ，则将使用border_radius的值

trans-unit.source: if any of the draw_circle_part is True then it will draw all circle parts that have the True
trans-unit.target: 如果任何一个draw_circle_part为True,那么它将绘制所有具有True的圆部分。

trans-unit.source: if the id is out of range None is returned, otherwise a tuple of (interf, name, input, output, opened) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果id超出范围，则返回 None ，否则返回一个元组（接口，名称，输入，输出，打开）。

trans-unit.source: if width > 0, used for line thickness
if width >= 1, used for line thickness (default is 1)
trans-unit.target: 如果width> = 1，则用于线宽（默认为1）

trans-unit.source: if width < 0, nothing will be drawn
trans-unit.target: 如果width <0，则不会绘制任何内容

trans-unit.source: if width < 1, nothing will be drawn
trans-unit.target: 如果width <1，则不会绘制任何内容
如果宽度==0,(默认)填充多边形。

内部处理pygame事件处理程序

trans-unit.source: is a str/bytes object. An optional offset gives a start position, in bytes, within the buffer where overwriting begins. If the offset is negative or greater that or equal to the buffer proxy's length value, an IndexException is raised. If len(buffer) > proxy.length + offset, a ValueError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 是一个 str / bytes 对象。一个可选的偏移量以字节为单位给出了覆盖开始的缓冲区内的开始位置。如果偏移量为负数或大于或等于缓冲区代理的 length 值，则引发 IndexException 。如果 len(buffer) > proxy.length + offset ，则引发 ValueError 。

trans-unit.source: output: 1 if the device is an output device, otherwise 0

trans-unit.source: palette_colors - if true we average the colors in palette, otherwise we average the pixel values. This is useful if the surface is actually greyscale colors, and not palette colors.
trans-unit.target: palette_colors-如果为真,我们对调色板中的颜色进行平均,否则我们对像素值进行平均。如果曲面实际上是灰度颜色,而不是调色板颜色,这很有用。

trans-unit.source: printing the whole thing returns a string like this:
trans-unit.target: 打印整个过程会返回一个这样的字符串。

trans-unit.source: pygame can recognize text or files dropped in its window. If a file is dropped, file will be its path.
trans-unit.target: pygame可以识别放置在其窗口中的文本或文件。如果文件被删除， file 将是其路径。

trans-unit.source: pygame can recognize text or files dropped in its window. If a file is dropped, file will be its path. The DROPTEXT event is only supported on X11.
trans-unit.target: pygame可以识别放置在其窗口中的文本或文件。如果文件被删除， file 将是其路径。该 DROPTEXT 仅支持X11事件。

trans-unit.source: pygame may not always be built to support all image formats. At minimum it will support uncompressed BMP. If pygame.image.get_extended() returns 'True', you should be able to load most images (including PNG, JPG and GIF).
trans-unit.target: pygame可能并不总是构建为支持所有图像格式。至少它将支持未压缩的 BMP 。如果 pygame.image.get_extended() 返回“ True”，则您应该能够加载大多数图像（包括PNG，JPG和GIF）。

trans-unit.source: pygame.fastevent is a wrapper for Bob Pendleton's fastevent library. It provides fast events for use in multithreaded environments. When using pygame.fastevent, you can not use any of the pump, wait, poll, post, get, peek, etc. functions from pygame.event, but you should use the Event objects.
trans-unit.target: pygame.fastevent 是 Bob Pendleton 的 fastevent 库的封装器。它提供了用于多线程环境的快速事件。当使用 pygame.fastevent 时,你不能使用 pygame.event 中的 pump、wait、poll、post、get、peek 等函数,但你应该使用事件对象。
